issue.title: *** New SubT Simulation docker image available on DockerHub ***

content.raw:
For some reason I do not see here comment from Adam starting: _Morning all, I think I figured out what was going on here._

In particular there was note regarding UID 1000 vs 1001 in newer Docker images … was it filtered out? Or is it only mine problem that I do not see here his post? \(I got it by e-mail and wanted to :thumbsup:
